MSG.Description: Creating instance SharedSQL failed, the database is continuing to run without SharedSQL.
A memory allocation failed. The $MEMREQUEST$ bytes requested could not be made available.
The temporary file for the flushing of commands from main memory could not be created.
A write operation to the temporary file failed.

MSG.ShortText: Temporary file could not be read
MSG.Description: Could not read from the temporary file.
A command could not be deleted from the temporary file.
A command could not be flushed from the temporary file.
A command could not be reloaded from the temporary file.
A command could not be deleted from the temporary file.
The internal structures of the hash table are erroneous.
The internal structure of the LRU list is erroneous.
An attempt was made to execute an operation that is not permissible at this time.

MSG.ShortText: Parse ID could not be added
MSG.Description: Entering a parse ID into SharedSQL failed.

MSG.ShortText: Execution plan could not be added
MSG.Description: Execution plan could not be inserted into SharedSQL.
An attempt was made to add an execution plan whose key already exists.

MSG.ShortText: No memory for new tree node
MSG.Description: An execution plan could not be inserted into SharedSQL, because not enough memory for the AVL tree could be allocated.
An attempt was made to insert some part of an execution plan into SharedSQL, whose parse ID does not correspond to that of the parts previously inserted.
A command could not be created in SharedSQL.
Two SharedSQL commands could not be compaired.
Handle could not be copied
The required locks for SharedSQL could not be created. The kernel is continuing to run without SharedSQL.
The tables concerned could not be added to the execution plan.
